products.name: Layer Chicken Cage
products.description: Durable and efficient cages for layer chickens, designed to provide optimal space and comfort for egg production.

products.name: Modern Chicken Cage
products.description: Innovative chicken cages with modern features to ensure the health and safety of your poultry.

products.name: Automatic Chicken Cage
products.description: Fully automated chicken cages with feeding and cleaning systems to reduce labor and increase efficiency.

products.name: Shed Chicken Cage
products.description: Spacious shed-style chicken cages for larger flocks, providing ample room for movement and growth.

products.name: Chicken Legs
products.description: Carefully processed chicken legs, perfect for grilling, baking, or frying, offering a flavorful and juicy experience.

products.name: Chicken Wings
products.description: Versatile and delicious chicken wings known for their rich flavor and crispy texture, ideal for appetizers or main courses.

products.name: Chicken Breasts
products.description: Lean and protein-rich chicken breasts, perfect for grilling, baking, or stir-frying, delivering a tender and juicy texture.

products.name: Whole Chicken
products.description: Complete whole chicken, perfect for roasting or slow-cooking, providing rich, succulent meat for family meals.

products.name: Chicken Sausages
products.description: Savory chicken sausages, perfect for grilling or adding to recipes, offering a flavorful and juicy experience.

products.name: Chicken Thighs
products.description: Tender and flavorful chicken thighs, ideal for baking, grilling, or slow-cooking, providing a satisfying meal.

products.name: Chicken Drumsticks
products.description: Juicy and flavorful chicken drumsticks, perfect for baking, frying, or grilling, offering a hearty meal.

services.name: Poultry Farm Consultation
services.description: Expert guidance on farm setup and management, including layout, cage selection, and feed management.

services.name: Custom Cage Design
services.description: Bespoke cage designs tailored to meet your specific poultry farm requirements and optimize operations.

services.name: Poultry Health Management
services.description: Comprehensive health monitoring and disease prevention strategies to maintain flock wellbeing.

services.name: Poultry Feed Supply
services.description: High-quality, balanced feed with reliable delivery to support the health and productivity of your flock.

services.name: Poultry Farm Training
services.description: Hands-on training covering farm management, biosecurity, nutrition, and breeding techniques.

services.name: Farm Equipment Maintenance
services.description: Regular maintenance and repairs for your farming equipment to ensure optimal performance and longevity.

services.name: Biosecurity Audit
services.description: Thorough assessment of your farm's biosecurity practices to identify risks and improve safety.
